name: CordovaBuild
description: Build a hybrid app project based on the Cordova CLI, Ionic CLI, TACO CLI, or other Cordova-compliant CLI
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: platform
inputs.label: Platform
inputs.helpMarkDown: Cordova platform to build. Valid options include android, ios, windows, and wp8.

inputs.name: configuration
inputs.label: Configuration
inputs.helpMarkDown: Debug (default) or Release

inputs.name: archs
inputs.label: Target Architectures
inputs.helpMarkDown: Space delimited list device architectures to build. Valid options for Windows include anycpu, x86, x84, and arm. Valid options for Android include x86 and arm.

inputs.name: cordovaVersion
inputs.label: Cordova Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version of Cordova tools to use to build. If not specified, looks at taco.json, the CORDOVA_DEFAULT_VERSION env var, and finally falls back to the latest version.

inputs.name: antBuild
inputs.label: Force Ant Build
inputs.helpMarkDown: Forces Cordova to use Apache Ant to build instead of Gradle to build versions of Cordova 5.0.0+ / Cordova Android 4.0.0+.

inputs.name: keystoreFile
inputs.label: Keystore File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional relative path to a Java keystore file that should be used for signing your app.

inputs.name: keystorePass
inputs.label: Keystore Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Password for the specified Keystore File.

inputs.name: keystoreAlias
inputs.label: Key Alias
inputs.helpMarkDown: Alias to the key to use for signing in the specified Keystore File.

inputs.name: keyPass
inputs.label: Key Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Password for key referenced by Key Alias in the specified Keystore File.

inputs.name: iosSignMethod
inputs.label: Override Signing Using
inputs.helpMarkDown: Indicates that the build should use different signing and/or mobile provisioning settings than are present in the workspace. Leave fields blank if you do not wish to override.

inputs.name: iosSigningIdentity
inputs.label: Signing Identity
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional signing identity override that should be used to sign the build. You may need to select "Unlock Default Keychain" if you use this option. Cordova defaults to "iPhone Developer" for debug builds and "iPhone Distribution" for release builds.

inputs.name: p12
inputs.label: P12 Certificate File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional relative path to a PKCS12 formatted p12 certificate file containing a signing certificate to be used for this build.

inputs.name: p12pwd
inputs.label: P12 Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Password to P12 Certificate File if specified. Use a Build Variable to encrypt.

inputs.name: unlockDefaultKeychain
inputs.label: Unlock Default Keychain
inputs.helpMarkDown: Resolve "User interaction is not allowed" errors by unlocking the default keychain.

inputs.name: defaultKeychainPassword
inputs.label: Default Keychain Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Password to unlock the default keychain when this option is set. Use a Build Variable to encrypt.

inputs.name: provProfileUuid
inputs.label: Provisioning Profile UUID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional UUID of an installed provisioning profile to be used for this build. Attempts to auto-match by default.

inputs.name: provProfile
inputs.label: Provisioning Profile File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional relative path to file containing provisioning profile override to be used for this build.

inputs.name: removeProfile
inputs.label: Remove Profile After Build
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies that the contents of the Provisioning Profile File should be removed from the build agent after the build is complete. **Only check if you are running one agent per user.**

inputs.name: xcodeDeveloperDir
inputs.label: Xcode Developer Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional path to Xcode Developer folder if not the system default. For use when multiple versions of Xcode are installed on a system. Ex: /Applications/Xcode6.4.app/Contents/Developer

inputs.name: windowsAppx
inputs.label: Windows APPX Target
inputs.helpMarkDown: Overrides type of APPX generated (Windows/Phone 8.1, 10). Valid values include: 8.1-win, 8.1-phone, uap (aka Windows/Phone 10) on Cordova 5.0.0+ / Cordova Windows 4.0.0+ and up.

inputs.name: windowsPhoneOnly
inputs.label: Target Windows Phone Only
inputs.helpMarkDown: Only generate an appx that works on Windows Phone.

inputs.name: windowsOnly
inputs.label: Target Windows Only
inputs.helpMarkDown: Only generate an appx that works on Windows.

inputs.name: cordovaArgs
inputs.label: Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional command line arguments that should be used to build.

inputs.name: cwd
inputs.label: Working Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Working directory for build runs. Defaults to the root of the repository.

inputs.name: outputPattern
inputs.label: Output Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path where build output (binaries) should be copied. Leave blank if you do not want to copy any output out of the platfom folders.

inputs.name: targetEmulator
inputs.label: Build for Emulator/Simulator
inputs.helpMarkDown: Build for a emulator or simulator instead of devices.
